develop.description: Launch API and production UI bundle

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run: echo "API: http://localhost:${API_PORT}" && echo "UI: http://localhost:${UI_PORT}" && echo "Admin: http://localhost:${UI_PORT}/admin"

steps.description: Start Go API server in production mode
steps.name: start-api

steps.description: Serve production UI bundle with optimized settings
steps.name: start-ui

setup.description: Build API & UI for the generated landing scenario

steps.description: Apply database schema (admin, variants, metrics, subscriptions, content sections) to postgres if psql is available
steps.name: db-schema
steps.run: if command -v psql >/dev/null; then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -f initialization/postgres/schema.sql; else echo "psql not found; runtime will auto-init schema"; fi

steps.description: Seed default admin user, variants, and content sections when psql is available
steps.name: db-seed
steps.run: if command -v psql >/dev/null; then psql "$DATABASE_URL" -f initialization/postgres/seed.sql; else echo "psql not found; skipping seed (runtime seeds defaults)"; fi

steps.description: Build Go API binary (landing-page-business-suite-api) in api/ directory for reuse by start-api step
steps.name: build-api
steps.run: cd api && GOWORK=off go mod download && GOWORK=off go build -o landing-page-business-suite-api .

steps.name: install-ui-deps
steps.run: if [ -f ui/package.json ]; then cd ui && pnpm install --ignore-workspace; else echo 'ui/ not present yet'; fi

steps.name: build-ui
steps.run: if [ -f ui/package.json ]; then cd ui && pnpm run build; else echo 'ui/ not present yet'; fi

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run: echo "API: http://localhost:${API_PORT}" && echo "UI: http://localhost:${UI_PORT}" && echo "Admin: http://localhost:${UI_PORT}/admin"

service.description: Generated landing page scenario from template 'landing-page-business-suite'
service.name: landing-page-business-suite
